locations.description: Title block with version, date, and generator metadata for the plan.
Goal, requirements summary, and key assumptions for Village Storefront.
Large-scale classification table and rationale per Section 8.1.
Architectural style, technology stack, components, data model, API style, and communication patterns.
List of planned diagrams, specs, and ADRs with iteration references.
Proposed repository tree showing modules, docs, API specs, ops assets, and plan storage.
Section 4 directives covering blueprint adherence, spec-first workflow, and acceptance expectations.
Summary of total iterations and dependency narrative linking phases.
Iteration 1 goal, context, and task list for platform foundation.
Bootstrap Maven multi-module project with Spotless, JaCoCo, and README updates.
Component Diagram (PlantUML) creation task describing bounded contexts/interactions.
Mermaid ERD expansion for tenant and shared entities with RLS notes.
Initial OpenAPI spec authoring for auth, tenant, and catalog endpoints.
TenantContext + TenantFilter implementation with tests and logging requirements.
MyBatis migrations for tenant/store tables and RLS policy validation.
CI/CD scaffolding task configuring GitHub Actions, Kubernetes manifests, and smoke script.
Iteration 2 goal, prerequisites, and task list focused on governance ADRs and multi-tenant services.
ADR 0001 documenting DelayedJob governance.
ADR 0002 defining feature flag lifecycle and metadata.
Checkout sequence diagram showing end-to-end flow and idempotency hooks.
Identity & Session service implementation including JWT, refresh, impersonation stubs, and session logs.
Catalog API build-out with Panache tenant filters, specs, and migrations.
Admin SPA scaffolding task configuring Quinoa, Tailwind, localization, and auth guard.
CI/CD pipeline diagram (Mermaid) describing GitHub Actions to k3s promotion.
Exit criteria summary for Identity, catalog, admin SPA, and diagrams.
Metrics tracked during Iteration 2 (auth coverage, RLS tests, SPA bundle baseline).
Risk + coordination notes for Iteration 2 (token shape alignment, diagram signoffs).
Follow-up actions post Iteration 2 (security review, SPA onboarding guide).
Iteration 3 scope covering consignment domain, media pipeline, and reporting foundations.
ERD update task adding consignment, POS, and media metadata tables.
Consignment payout sequence diagram capturing autopayout flow.
Consignment API implementation covering consignors, items, commissions, and portal endpoints.
Media upload service implementation with presigned URLs and storage adapters.
Media processing sequence diagram describing upload, jobs, and storefront updates.
DelayedJob worker subsystem with FFmpeg integration and metrics.
Reporting projection service seeding domain events, tables, and APIs.
Exit criteria for consignment, media pipeline, and reporting readiness.
Metrics tracked for media throughput, commission coverage, reporting latency.
Risks and mitigations (FFmpeg resources, PII encryption, payout dependencies).
Follow-up tasks (threat modeling for uploads, payout runbooks).
Iteration 4 plan emphasizing loyalty, platform admin, impersonation, and observability.
Loyalty domain model diagram creation.
Loyalty service implementation with ledger, tiers, scheduled job, and checkout integration.
Platform impersonation sequence diagram documenting governance and audit steps.
Platform admin backend APIs for SaaS-level dashboards and impersonation control.
Multi-currency/FX service with Money value object, scheduled job, and DTO updates.
Observability enhancements adding logging filters, OpenTelemetry spans, and Grafana dashboards.
Admin SPA updates for platform dashboard, impersonation UI, and localization.
Exit criteria summarizing loyalty integration, platform admin readiness, FX rollout, and observability.
Metrics (ledger overhead, API latency, FX freshness) tracked during Iteration 4.
Risk list covering loyalty accuracy, impersonation misuse, and FX outages.
Follow-up actions (compliance review, training materials) post Iteration 4.
Iteration 5 plan focusing on POS, headless APIs, shipping/returns, payments, and hardening.
Headless API completion with spec, OAuth scopes, and integration tests.
POS offline flow diagram mapping device queues and reconciliation.
POS backend + SPA implementation including offline queue encryption and device monitoring.
Shipping and returns integrations with carrier adapters, caching, and RMA flows.
Gift card/store credit/refund enhancements and PaymentProvider extensibility.
Performance + reliability hardening with load tests and HPA tuning.
Release readiness documentation sweep and plan manifest updates.
Exit criteria for POS, headless, shipping/returns, performance, and docs.
Metrics tracked (POS flush success, headless error rate, shipping latency).
Risk + mitigation list for carrier limits, POS key rotation, and gift card fraud.
Follow-up actions preparing GA review and future roadmap.
Section 6 detailing testing levels, CI/CD flow, quality gates, artifact validation, and release governance.
Core glossary terms explaining platform-specific concepts.
Extended glossary entries covering GraalVM, Stripe Connect, domain events, and operational tooling.
